page_props.header: Building on Emory's commitment to serve humanity

props.header: Emory College of Arts and Sciences provides the sense of community and quality of faculty engagement usually found at a liberal arts college, but embedded within an urban research  university, with the full resources and opportunities that entails.
props.text:
Our outstanding 550-member faculty guide students as they explore widely and dive deeply into their own interests and our research priorities. Post-doctoral researchers play an important role in the undergraduate college, bringing fresh ideas and driving new thought.

Emory College boasts 50 departments and programs, several of which have achieved a national reputation. We offer 86 majors and 63 minors â€” rigorous courses of study that emphasize critical thinking, asking bold questions, and expanding the boundaries of knowledge. Students continue their education outside of the classroom with experiential learning like internships, undergraduate research, entrepreneurial experiences, and study abroad.

props.text: I basically deleted the manuscript that I had submitted. And I just wrote the whole thing anew. I started writing in April, and I finished the whole thing by, I think, August.

items.title: Student scholarships, designed to offer all need-based financial aid recipients a package without loans
items.description: Emory College remains need-blind, funding nearly 90 percent of financial aid through its operational budget. Since 2007, Emory Advantage has offered students with family incomes of $100,000 or less the opportunity to graduate with little or no debt, and the recently completed Scholarship
